bibl.title: Upon Sarapis.
Zaki ALY, Essays and Papers. A Miscellaneous Output of Greek Papyri from Graeco-Roman Egypt
bibl.author: ALY, Zaki

bibl.note: Note inédite relative au culte de Sarapis, institué par Ptolémée Ier pour "cimenter les relations mutuelles" entre Grecs et Égyptiens.
bibl.seg: Zaki ALY, Essays and Papers. A Miscellaneous Output of Greek Papyri from Graeco-Roman Egypt (Athens, 1994) p. 75.
